thread.title: Dior addict customer
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Dior addict customer

author: Dior addict customer
title: Dior addict customer
text:
I always purchase my products at a store. However, I was busy after returning from trip. Decided to go on-line to replenish items. Purchasing was easy, however I knew exactly what and which shades I I wanted.
Miss the skin illuminator- in white tube which has been discontinued.
